attr.desc: The 2048 puzzle game
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Abe's Amazing Adventure
attr.desc: A scrolling, platform-jumping, key-collecting, ancient pyramid exploring game, vaguely in the style of similar games for the Commodore+4.  Abe's Adventure files are already included and ready to go.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Abombniball
attr.desc:
The objective of Abombniball is to defuse all the explosives on each level.
As a ball, this would normally be a simple task,
however each level is filled with traps and devious puzzles.
attr.inst: You defuse bombs by landing on the bombs square, however you can only defuse the bomb thats currently counting down. Trying to defuse any other bomb will cause it to explode.

attr.title: Abu Simbel Profanation Deluxe
attr.desc: An open-source, freeware remake of the Spanish platform game from 1985 replaces the graphics and sounds with new enhanced assets, while maintaining the same unforgiving gameplay of the original.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Abuse
attr.desc: A fork of the original Abuse SDL port from http://abuse.zoy.org/.  An intense 2D shooter.  Plays best on dual analog stick devices.  Just download and play.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Aleph-One Marathon 1
attr.desc: An open source version of Bungie's Marathon 1 first person shooter.
attr.inst: All files have been included.

attr.title: Aleph-One Marathon 2
attr.desc: An open source version of Bungie's Marathon 2 first person shooter.
attr.inst: All files have been included.

attr.title: Aleph-One Marathon Infinity
attr.desc: An open source version of Bungie's Marathon Infinity first person shooter.
attr.inst: All files have been included.

attr.title: Alien vs Predator
attr.desc: The three most ferocious species in the universe in a bloodthirsty battle for the ultimate prize: survival. Take your pick: be a Colonial Marine, a Predator or an Alien. Fight through suspense-filled environments: from starships and space stations to colonial bases and eerie planetscapes. One wrong move turns you from hunter to prey.
attr.inst: You will need the original files of the PC release copied to the ports/avp folder.

attr.title: AM2R
attr.desc: Another Metroid 2 Remake.  An action-adventure game developed by Argentinian programmer Milton Guasti (also known as DoctorM64).
attr.inst: You'll need to provide your own am2r android apk into the ports/am2r/gamedata folder.  Make sure it is named am2r.apk.  The name is case sensitive.

attr.title: Anarch
attr.desc: Anarch is extremely small, completely public domain, no-dependency, no-file, portable suckless anarcho-pacifist from-scratch 90s-style Doom clone that runs everywhere, made for the benefit of all living beings
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Augustus
attr.desc: A reimplemntation of the Caeser 3 engine.
attr.inst: You will need the original files of the PC release copied to the ports/augustus/data folder.

attr.title: Axiom Verge
attr.desc: A port of Axiom Verge, an awesome metroidvania 2D platformer.
attr.inst: You will need to add your own files to the ports/axiom-verge/gamedata folder. YOU HAVE TO USE THE DRM FREE EPIC GAMES VERSION. file in your Portmaster/libs folder. All intructions are in the ports/axiom-verge/gamedata folder

attr.title: Banana Duck
attr.desc:
In Banana Duck, you'll experience the sweet taste of pursuing bananas and avoiding all the evil vegetables and saw blades that are there for absolutely no reason. Also, you're a duck that can't swim and dies when it touches the water.

LEFT/RIGHT = Horizontal movement
A/B = Jump
R1 = Reload
START = Pause
attr.inst: Game files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Beat of The PixelHeat
attr.desc: Beat of The Pixel Heat is a rhythm game in which you must control HEAT, an artificial intelligence responsible for defending cyberspace from a wave of viral elements that have invaded your home!
attr.inst: Run PixelHeat.sh

attr.title: Beat2x
attr.desc: Beat2x is DDR-style rythm game where the goal is to time the button presses to line up with the music beat.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play

attr.title: Bermuda Syndrome
attr.desc: A reimplemntation of the Berumuda Syndrome engine.
attr.inst: You will need the original files of the PC release or PC demo copied to the ports/bermuda/DATA folder.

attr.title: Billy Frontier
attr.desc: This is Pangea Software's Billy Frontier updated to run on modern operating systems. Use the touchscreen to navigate the UI and gameplay.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Blake Stone Aliens of Gold
attr.desc: The unofficial source port for Blake Stone Aliens of Gold.
attr.inst: Includes the shareware files.  You can also add your own full version Blake Stone Aliens of Gold files to the ports/bstone-aog/gamedata/alien_of_gold folder.

attr.title: Blake Stone Planet Strike
attr.desc: The unofficial source port for Blake Stone Planet Strike.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version Blake Stone Planet Strike files to the ports/bstone-ps/gamedata/planet_strike folder.

attr.title: Blob Wars: Metal Blob Solid
attr.desc: Metal Blob Solid is the first game in the Blob Wars series made by Parallel Realities. It is a 2D platform game, where you control Bob in an effort to save his world from an invasion of alien Blobs.
attr.inst: Blobwars files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Blobby Volley 2
attr.desc: A head-to-head multiplayer ball game.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Block Attack
attr.desc: A Tetris Attack Clone.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: BlockOut II
attr.desc: BlockOut II is a free adaptation of the original BlockOut DOS game. BlockOut II has the same features than the original game with few graphic improvements.
attr.inst: BlockOut II files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Blood
attr.desc: Blood port based on EDuke32.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version Blood 1.21 files to the ports/Blood folder.

attr.title: Blues Brothers
attr.desc: A rewrite of the Blues Brothers game engine developed by Titus Interactive.
attr.inst: Includes the demo files.  You can add your own full game Amiga or Dos files to the ports/bluesbrothers/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Blues Brothers: Jukebox Adventure
attr.desc: A rewrite of the Blues Brothers game engine developed by Titus Interactive.
attr.inst: Includes the demo files.  You can add your own full game Dos files to the ports/bbda/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Bugdom
attr.desc: This is Pangea Software's Bugdom updated to run on modern operating systems. Use the touchscreen to navigate the UI.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Burst
attr.desc:
Your aura switches between red and blue every few seconds, hit balls the same color as your aura to gain points. The more balls there are on the screen, the more points you get. Game files are already included and ready to go.

DPAD = Movement
A / B = Dash
R1 = Restart
START = Pause
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: C-Dogs
attr.desc: C-Dogs is a classic overhead run-and-gun game
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Cannonball
attr.desc: This is the libretro port of the OutRun game engine recreation written by Chris White in 2014.
attr.inst: Add the OutRun Revision B ROMs into /ports/cannonball/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Cave Story (Evo)
attr.desc: Cave Story using the Nxengine-evo engine from https://github.com/nxengine/nxengine-evo
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Cave Story lr
attr.desc: Cave Story using the Libretro Retroarch Nxengine core.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Celeste Classic
attr.desc: Celeste Classic is a C source port of the original celeste (Celeste classic).
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Chasm
attr.desc: Explore the depths below a remote mountain town in this procedurally-generated Adventure Platformer. Taking inspiration from hack 'n slash dungeon crawlers and Metroidvania-style platformers, Chasm will immerse you in a fantasy world full of exciting treasure, deadly enemies, and abundant secrets.
attr.inst: Copy the game's assets to the 'chasm/gamedata/' folder.

attr.title: Chip n Dale Rescue Rangers: Remastered
attr.desc: Nutcase was kidnapped by the cat Fatso, and Chip and Dale went to save her. As they begin the operation, they discover that the enemy has plotted more serious difficulties for the entire world. Not only will you need to help Gaika, but also destroy the antagonist's further plans. In the remaster, the developer completely changed the textures and character animations
attr.inst: Ready to run, launch CHIPNDALE.sh

attr.title: Cliff Hanger
attr.desc:
Traverse the different levels of this huge cave, in less than 12 seconds, or else, you die!

For some reason tho, time doesnt seem to keep going when you grab on ledges and maybe some other things, idk.

Make sure to collect all of those shiny diamond thingies, they surely are important for you, I assure you!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Clockwind
attr.desc: The mechanic of this game is time travel. Make your way through 4 levels utilizing the passage of time in different ways. This may involve making trees grow or turning a car in to a flying car.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: ColorLines
attr.desc: A forked and updated version of SDL re-implementation of classic Color Lines game, originally written by Nikita Zimin in 2010.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Commander Genius
attr.desc: Commander Genius is an open-source clone of Commander Keen (1-6, Dreams) which allows you to play these episodes and some of the mods made for them.  Developed by Gerstrong.
attr.inst: Includes the shareware version of Commander Keen 1.  You can add load your own keen folders into the ports/cgenius/games folder.

attr.title: Community: Journey to the Center of Hawkthorne
attr.desc:
This 2d platformer is based on Community's Digital Estate Planning episode. 

A group of warriors are summoned to the kingdom of Hawkthorne™ to take on a quest to recover the fabled "White Diamond of Discipline"™ found in the depths of the dark pit of despair known as The Black Cave™.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: CorsixTH
attr.desc: An opensource clone of Theme Hospital.
attr.inst: Load your Theme Hospital files into the ports/corsixth/HOSP folder.  As an example, the demo files of Theme Hospital is already included.

attr.title: Cosmo-Engine
attr.desc: A new game engine to play the MS-DOS game Cosmo's Cosmic Adventure on modern systems.
attr.inst: Episode 1 is included and you can add Episode 2 and 3 gamefiles to the data folder.

attr.title: Cro-Mag Rally
attr.desc: This is a port of Pangea Software’s racing game Cro-Mag Rally. Take control of the caveman Brog as you race through the  Stone, Bronze, and Iron Ages in primitive vehicles.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Daikatana
attr.desc: Travel through time to fight a corrupted dictatorship and right the wrongs inflicted on the world.
attr.inst: You must add the retail data files from the 'data/' folder to the port's 'daikatana/gamedata/' folder.

attr.title: Dave Gnukem
attr.desc: Dave Gnukem is a cross-platform 2D scrolling platform shooter inspired by Duke Nukem 1.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Deep Sleep
attr.desc: It's morning and you gotta wake up for work, you hear the alarm clocks, but to wake up you need to collect all the clocks and escape the room before deep sleep ghosts catch you. They'll follow your every step and will eventually catch and make you fall into Deep Sleep if you're not careful. Use your Dream Pillow to traverse through 15 different and challenging levels! Good luck!
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Defshot
attr.desc: A 2D shooter made for the KoriJam
attr.inst:
Download defshot_linux64.zip from https://securas.itch.io/defshot
Extract the defshot_linux64.zip file
Copy the defshot.pck to your defshot ports folder Notes: Thanks to securas for creating this game and making it available for free on itch.io. Also thanks to Cebion for the packaging for portmaster.

attr.title: Der Clou!
attr.desc: A burglary simulation game originally created by neo Software Produktions GmbH.
attr.inst: Der Clou!'s files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: DevilutionX
attr.desc: DevilutionX is a source port of Diablo from https://github.com/diasurgical/devilutionX.
attr.inst: Includes the Diablo shareware version.  You can add your own full version DIABDAT.MPQ file to the ports/devilution folder.  To run the Diablo: Hellfire expansion you will need to also copy hellfire.mpq, hfmonk.mpq, hfmusic.mpq, hfvoice.mpq. See wiki if you experience issues with version upgrades or configuration changes.

attr.title: Dinothawr
attr.desc: Dinothawr is a block pushing puzzle game on slippery surfaces.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Diver Down
attr.desc: Diver Down is a stealth-platformer. Avoid the lights on 20 different stages using your mysterious Diver Down ability, that allows you to dive onto solids! .
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Dome Romantik
attr.desc: Dig your way through to the core of the planet. Mine minerals, bring them back to your dome and install upgrades just in time to defend from hostile lifeforms.
attr.inst: Launch DomeRomantik.sh

attr.title: Donut Dodo
attr.desc: If a long lost arcade game from 1983 resurfaced today, it would be Donut Dodo -- a classic 2D platformer from the golden era, tough as nails and challenging for the whole family! Ready to top the high score table?
attr.inst:
You can purchase Donut Dodo at: https://zapposh.itch.io/donut-dodo-retropie-edition

Download and extract it, and place the DonutDodo.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with DonutDodo_1_39.zip

DPAD/ANALOG = Movement
B/A = Jump

attr.title: Doom 3
attr.desc: Doom 3 is a 2004 survival horror first-person shooter video game developed by id Software and published by Activision.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files to the ports/doom3/base folder.

attr.title: DROID7
attr.desc: Jump your way up on a generated tower while a laser beam chases you from below. The higher you go, the faster it gets, and it isn't long before disappearing (and reappearing) platforms and spikes are introduced to make your life harder.
attr.inst:
You can purchase DROID7 at: https://juancolacelli.itch.io/droid7

Download the Windows version and extract it, and place the DROID7.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with Windows 64-bit, Dec 30 2022 release

LEFT/RIGHT = Horizontal movement
B/A = Jump
LEFT ANALOG = Mouse position
R1 = Mouse click

attr.title: Duke Nukem 3D
attr.desc: Duke Nukem 3D using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version duke3d.grp and duke.rts Duke Nukem 3D Atomic files to the ports/rednukem/gamedata folder.

attr.title: DungeonRush
attr.desc: A opensource game inspired by Snake, written in pure C with SDL
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Echo Chamber
attr.desc:
Wizard roguelike
Traverse a dungeon and add a new spell each time you clear a floor.

Your spells cycle in a loop.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Eity
attr.desc: Eity is a rhythm game with cool music.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Enigma
attr.desc: Enigma is a puzzle game inspired by Oxyd on the Atari ST and Rock'n'Roll on the Amiga
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Escape
attr.desc:
Escape is a fun puzzle game in the tradition of Adventures of Lolo or Chip's Challenge 
Unlike either of those games, Escape doesn't rely at all on reflexes—it's all about your brain.
attr.inst: Game files are included.

attr.title: Exhumed
attr.desc: A port of the PC version of Exhumed based on EDuke32.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version STUFF.DAT, DEMO.VCR and BOOK.MOV files to the ports/Exhumed folder.

attr.title: Exult
attr.desc: A port of Ultima 7.
attr.inst: You'll need A copy of the black gate and/or serpent isle added to ports/exult/data/blackgate and/or ports/exult/data/serpentisle.

attr.title: F1 Race
attr.desc: F1 Race is a port of the F1 Race game from MTK OS.
attr.inst: All game files are included and game is ready to play

attr.title: F2bgl
attr.desc: A reimplementation of the Fade to Black game.
attr.inst: You will need the original files of the PC release or PC demo copied to the ports/f2bgl folder.

attr.title: Falling Time
attr.desc: Arcade game inspired by Fall Down.
attr.inst: Falling Time files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Fallout 1
attr.desc: Fallout is a post nuclear RPG.
attr.inst: You need to copy critter.dat, master.dat and data from the original game to ports/fallout1 folder.

attr.title: Fallout 2
attr.desc: Fallout 2 is a post nuclear RPG.
attr.inst: You need to copy critter.dat, master.dat, patch000.dat and data from the original game to ports/fallout2 folder.

attr.title: Farmner
attr.desc: *single stick command included in the directory, rename and boot* Your daughter has gone missing. You have followed footsteps next to a path to what seems to be an abandoned farmland. There are torches still glowing hot, where is everyone? Find your daughter, quickly!.
attr.inst: The game files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Final Quest
attr.desc: Embark on an exciting journey in Final Quest: A Godot Research, a unique blend of a captivating 2D platform game and an in-depth research guide for the Godot game engine.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Fire and Fondness 2
attr.desc:
A puzzle game about rescuing your loved one from hazardous situations! Also, a send-up of daytime television.

Daytime television just got hot: in the hit gameshow, Fire & Fondness, 
young lovers put their relationships to the test in the ultimate courtship ritual:
 attempting to navigate a succession of convoluted, flamethrower-filled deathtraps.

It also has a dog.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Fire Arrow (Remastered)
attr.desc: Fire Arrow is a time attack (or 'Caravan', what used to be an important tradition in Japanese STGs in 90s) style shooter with a heavy emphasis on scoring, also known as "coffee break shmups"
attr.inst: Just copy data.win and ogg files inside gamedata. This version is NOT compatible with the one in the folder FAX,but the one you can find in the folder FA1.

attr.title: Flare Engine
attr.desc: Flare is an open source, 2D action RPG. Its game play can be likened to the games in the Diablo series.  The game files are already included and ready to go.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Free Heroes of Might and Magic II
attr.desc: A a recreation of Heroes of Might and Magic 2 game engine by Ihar Hubchyk.
attr.inst: Includes demo files, just add the data and maps folders from your full version GOG HOMM2 to the ports/fheroes2 folder for the full game.

attr.title: Freedom Planet
attr.desc: A combat-based platform adventure.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Freedom Planet for Linux copied to the ports/freedomplanet/gamedata folder.

attr.title: FreedroidRPG
attr.desc: The game tells the story of a world destroyed by a conflict between robots and their human masters. Play as Tux in a quest to save the world from the murderous rebel bots who know no mercy. You get to choose which path you wish to follow, and freedom of choice is everywhere in the game.
attr.inst: FreedroidRPG files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Freegemas
attr.desc: Freegemas is an open source version of the well known Bejeweled.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: FreeSerf
attr.desc: FreeSerf is a faithful clone of the brilliant simulation game The Settlers 1 aka Serf City.
attr.inst: In oder to play you need to copy the DOS data file is called SPAE.PA, SPAD.PA, SPAF.PA, or SPAU.PA, depending on the language of the game; or Amiga files gfxheader, gfxfast, gfxchip, gfxpics, sounds, and music. into ports/freeserf folder.

attr.title: GemRB
attr.desc: GemRB (Game Engine Made with preRendered Background) is a portable open-source reimplementation of the Infinity Engine that underpinned Baldur's Gate, Icewind Dale and Planescape: Torment.
attr.inst: Add your game files to the ports/gemrb/games/GAMEID directory, multiple games can be installed and you will get a choice of which game you want to play at launch.

attr.title: Gigalomania
attr.desc: Gigalomania is an open source 2D Real Time Strategy god game.
attr.inst: Gigalomania files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Gmu Music Player
attr.desc: Gmu is an open source music player for portable gaming consoles and handhelds.
attr.inst: Add your music to the 'ports/gmu-music-player/music' folder for easy access or wherever else you wish as you can browse all storage for files.

attr.title: GNU Robbo
attr.desc: GNU Robbo is a free open source reimplementation of game designed by Janusz Pelc and published by LK Avalon in 1989 for the Atari XL/XE computers.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play

attr.title: Gumgem
attr.desc: Venture into a procedurally generated castle, different every time you play. The evil gummy bear has taken the prince prisoner, and you're our only hope!
attr.inst:
You can purchase Gumgem at: https://dazel.itch.io/gumgem

Download the GameShell version and extract it, and place the Gumgem.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with the Gumgem 2.2 - GameShell

DPAD = Movement
A = Dash
B = Jump
 X = Interact

attr.title: Half-Life
attr.desc: Half-Life is Valve's debut title which blends blends action and adventure with award-winning technology to create a frighteningly realistic world where players must think to survive.
attr.inst: You need to have your own copy of the game. You need to copy the steam valve directory from your steam installation into ports/Half-Life/valve directory. You can also run Half-Life Blue Shift/Opposing Forces by copying the contents of the bshift/gearbox steam files into their respective ports/Half-Life/ directory.

attr.title: Heart of Darkness
attr.desc: Heart of Darkness using the hode reimplementation of the engine developed by Amazing Studio.
attr.inst: Just add your own Heart of Darkness game files to the ports/hode/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Heart Of The Alien Redux
attr.desc: Heart of the Alien is a cinematic platform game developed by Interplay Productions and was released by Virgin Interactive Entertainment in 1994.
attr.inst:
Heart Of The Alien (U).iso and 
Heart Of The Alien (U) xx.ogg or Heart Of The Alien (U) xx.mp3 02-42 need to be placed in the data folder

attr.title: HELP! NO BRAKE
attr.desc:
Hey umm, your car won't brake anymore. So better clear all the levels to get it fixed I guess. Game files are already included and ready to go.

LEFT/RIGHT = Steer
B / A = Boost
START = Pause
R1 = Quick restart
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Hex-A-Hop
attr.desc: Hex-a-hop is a puzzle game in which a girl has to destroy green hexagons by stepping on them.
attr.inst: Hex-a-Hop files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Hexen 2
attr.desc: Hexen II is a dark fantasy 1st-person shooter developed by Raven Software and published by id software.  Portal of Praevus features new levels, new enemies and a new playable character class, The Demoness.
attr.inst: You must copy your Hexen 2 pak0.pak and pak1.pak files into hexen2/data1 and your pak3.pak into hexen2/portals and make sure they're lowercase.

attr.desc: Hijinx is a platformer that incorporates the theme of "pick your poison" by having players pick from a set of handicaps for each level, with help from Carl, the bumbling tortoise.
attr.inst: Game files are included.
attr.title: Hijinx
Hocoslamfy
attr.desc: You are a small bee and you must fly to avoid the bamboo shoots.
attr.inst: Hocoslamfy files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Hunt for the Shadow Rider
attr.desc: A rogue Shadow Rider has escaped to the year 2078. You are the only Hunter left who can take him down
attr.inst: Boot Hunt.sh and play.

attr.title: Hurrican
attr.desc: Turrican port by Thrimbor.
attr.inst: Just add the data and lang folders from here to the ports/hurrican folder or just launch Hurrican from the ports menu in Emulationstation and it will download the files and install them automatically.

attr.title: Hydra Castle Labyrinth
attr.desc: Hydra Castle Labyrinth is a platform game with some old school action. It's also reminiscent of games of the 16 bit era.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: hyper JUMP
attr.desc:
Pick up the yellow orbs, dodge everything else. Game files are already included and ready to go.

DPAD = Movement
A / B = Jump
START = Pause
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Hyperfight
attr.desc:
HYPERFIGHT is a fighting game where every hit is lethal, and every win counts.
You'll have to risk your points to gain access to your character's special
and super moves, which can turn the tide of the game in a heartbeat. 
Designed to be easy to pick up and hard to master, so grab a friend, any friend!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Iconoclasts
attr.desc: A platformer that offers fun and wacky gameplay.  Recommended only for 640x480 devices or better.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Iconoclasts for Linux copied to the ports/iconoclasts/gamedata folder.  Be sure the folder contains subfolders named 32, 64 and data.

attr.title: iiChantra
attr.desc: iiChantra is a cross-platform 2D-Action, «retro» in style but modern in gameplay.
attr.inst: iiChantra files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Invaders
attr.desc: A memory accurate reimplementation of Space Invaders by loadzero.
attr.inst: You'll need to provide your own invaders.e, invaders.f, invaders.g, and invaders.h files from a MAME_078 romset into the invaders/inv1 folder.

attr.title: Jazz2 Resurrection
attr.desc: Jazz2 Resurrection is a complete reimplementation of Jazz Jackrabbit 2, a superb 2D platformer, a sequel to Epic Megagames' earlier shareware classic Jazz Jackrabbit (also available in PortMaster).
attr.inst: Let the intro play the first time you start the game, so it creates cache files. Copy the original game files (The Secret Files and/or The Christmas Chronicles) to ports/jazz2/Source.

attr.title: Laser Kombat
attr.desc: Laser Kombat is a classic puzzle game, now available for modern systems. Destroy all the tanks to beat the level. Stay out of line of sight, though, or you will get shot. Shoot your lasers at mirrors, blow up bomb or push your enemies into water with movable blocks to win.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play

attr.title: LBreakoutHD
attr.desc: LBreakoutHD is a scaleable 16:9 remake of LBreakout2. You try to clear levels full of different types of bricks and extras by using your paddle to aim balls at the bricks.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Magic Vigilante
attr.desc: This is a difficult bullet-hell shooter. There are 7+1 levels. Half of them are boss battles. Good luck!
attr.inst: Download game from https://nizakashii.itch.io/magicvigilante, copy data.win to /ports/magicviglante/gamedata

attr.title: Maldita Castilla
attr.desc: An arcade action video game developed by Locomalito and released in December 2012.  The gameplay is inspired by the games Shinobi and Ghost and Goblins.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Margot-Béatrice Adventure
attr.desc:
The courageous princess Margot-Béatrice try to re-take the forest gem 
but she encounter a terrible (in every way) sorcerer that emprison her 
in a cristal prison. She now forced to call her animal friends
to free her and save the forest.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Maximilien Adventure
attr.desc:
Maximilien, a young adventure, survive a terrible plane crash. 
With the help of some locals, he will needs to get through the jungle and find his brother and sister.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Me and My Shadow
attr.desc: Me and My Shadow is a puzzle/platform game in which you try to reach the exit by solving puzzles. Spikes, moving blocks, fragile blocks and much more stand between you and the exit. Record your moves and let your shadow mimic them to reach blocks you couldn't reach alone.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Megaman Rock N Roll
attr.desc: A mysterious robot force is invading the city and abducting Robot Masters. Protoman and Megaman both succumb to the terror leaving Roll alone and scared. Back at Dr. Light's lab Roll decides to go through the procedure her brother did to become a super fighting robot.
attr.inst:
Run Megaman.sh
Suggested to play on device with 2 gb of ram to lower a lot the possibility of slowdowns, but is has been defined playable also on lower specs device.

attr.title: Meritous
attr.desc: Action-adventure dungeon crawl game.
attr.inst: Meritous files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Mighty Mike
attr.desc: This is Pangea Software's Mighty Mike (also known as Power Pete). Set in a toy store, this top-down action game is a staple of 90's Macintosh games.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Mirror Magic
attr.desc: Arcade style game for in the tradition of Deflektor (C 64) and Mindbender (Amiga).
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Miss Driller
attr.desc: Miss Driller is an open source game inspired by Mr. Driller. The objective of the game is to try to drill as deep as you can without losing all your oxygen or have blocks fall on you.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play

attr.title: Moonlight
attr.desc: A free, open-source NVIDIA Gamestream Client.  For more info on the setup needs at https://github.com/christianhaitian/arkos/wiki/ArkOS-Emulators-and-Ports-information#moonlight-nvidia-gamestreaming-app-available-through-portmaster.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Mr Boom
attr.desc: A Bomberman clone.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Multris
attr.desc: A version of Tetris with randomly generated polyominoes of varying sizes.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Murtop
attr.desc: Fast-paced arcade game packed with action, as if it was taken out directly from the 80's, where Dig Dug meets Bomberman.
attr.inst:
You can purchase Murtop at: https://hiulit.itch.io/murtop

Download and extract it, and place the Murtop.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with Murtop ARM 64, version 1.2.0

R1 = 5 (insert coin)
B / A = SPACE (drop bomb)
START = 1 (start)
X = P (pause / menu to quit)

attr.title: NAM
attr.desc: NAM using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version NAM.GRP and NAM.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-NAM/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Nanosaur
attr.desc: This is Pangea Software’s Nanosaur, which casts a cybernetic dinosaur from the future who’s sent back in time 20 minutes before a giant asteroid hits the Earth.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Nanosaur 2
attr.desc: This is Pangea Software’s Nanosaur II: Hatchling, a continuation of the original Nanosaur storyline, only this time you get to fly a pterodactyl.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Neverball
attr.desc:
Tilt the floor to roll a ball through an obstacle course within the given time. If the ball falls or time expires, a ball is lost.

Collect coins to unlock the exit and earn extra balls. Red coins are worth 5. Blue coins are worth 10. A ball is awarded for 100 coins.

Includes Neverputt.
attr.inst:
All files are included and game is ready to run.

Dpad and left stick are movement
A is select/enter
B is back/escape
Select is escape
Start is enter

attr.title: nKaruga
attr.desc: A cool 2D bullet hell shooter.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Nonny
attr.desc: Nonny is a simple nonogram game that lets you play and create nonogram puzzles!
attr.inst: All files are included and ready to play.

attr.title: Nothing
attr.desc:
A simple platformer with a powerful editor.*

*Use keyboard and mouse for the editor
attr.inst: Boot Nothing.sh and play

attr.title: Nova Pinball
attr.desc:
A pinball game created with the Love game framework.

Your mission: Make the star go nova. There are in-game hints that point out the next target to achieve your goal.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: NPuzzle
attr.desc: NPuzzle is a 15 puzzle style sliding game where you have to rearrange the tiles in order.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Oddworld: Abes Oddysee Exoddus
attr.desc: It is a platformer with puzzle-solving elements.
attr.inst: You need to copy all .lvl and .ddv files (and sound.dat for Exoddus) from the original game(s) to either ports/oddysee or ports/exoddus directory.

attr.title: Open Great Giana Sisters
attr.desc: Open Great Giana Sisters is a Free Software/Open Source implementation/remake of The Great Giana Sisters.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: OpenBlok
attr.desc: A customizable, cross platform, open-source falling block game, packed with a bunch of features.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: OpenClaw
attr.desc: A Reimplementation of the 1997 Captain Claw platformer.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: OpenFodder
attr.desc: Open Fodder is an open source version of the Cannon Fodder engine.
attr.inst: It comes with demo files, you can add the full version files by reading the included README.md

attr.title: OpenJazz
attr.desc: A free, open-source version of the classic Jazz Jackrabbit games by Alister Thomson.
attr.inst: Includes the Jazz Jackrabiit shareware files.  You can add your own full game Dos files to the ports/openjazz/gamedata folder.

attr.title: OpenMRac
attr.desc: OpenMRac is a split-screen racing game. It is a tweaked source release of MultiRacer.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: OpenOMF
attr.desc: An Open Source remake of 'One Must Fall 2097' by Diversions Entertainment.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: OpenRCT2
attr.desc: OpenRCT2 is Open source re-implementation of RollerCoaster Tycoon 2.
attr.inst: Add your Roller Coaster Tycoon 2 game files to the ports/openrct2/RCT2 directory, and optionally add your Roller Coaster Tycoon 1 files to ports/openrct2/RCT1.

attr.title: OpenSupaplex
attr.desc: OpenSupaplex is a 1:1 reimplementation of the original game in C and SDL, with just a few changes to make it easy to use with game controllers, and also easy to port to any platform.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play. Every levelset requires a there to be a player created. Levelset 1 had a premade PLAYER1 created but all others will require you to create a new one. You can use start + dpad down to enter text input mode.

attr.title: OpenSyobon
attr.desc: An SDL-based cross-platform port of Syobon Action
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: OpenTyrian
attr.desc: OpenTyrian is an open-source port of the DOS game Tyrian.
attr.inst: OpenTyrian 2.1 files are already included as they were made freeware sometime ago.

attr.title: OpenXcom Extended
attr.desc: OXCE is an open source engine for running XCOM:Ufo Defense and Terror From the Deep.
attr.inst: You will need to provide your own UFO Defense/TFTD game files.  Read the README-port.txt file for details.

attr.title: Otto Matic
attr.desc: This is Pangea Software’s Otto Matic. Take control of the robot Otto Matic and save earth from aliens from Planet X
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Owlboy
attr.desc: A story-driven platform adventure game, where you can fly and explore a brand new world in the clouds.  Text is not readable on devices with screens less than 5 inches.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Owlboy for Linux copied to the ports/owlboy/gamedata folder.

attr.title: PAUSED
attr.desc:
What do ducks have to do with rabbits? Exactly, adventure and physics stuff are what you are looking for.

LEFT/RIGHT = Horizontal movement
DOWN = Fall
A = Jump
B or R1 = Switch
L1 = Reload
START = Pause
attr.inst: Game files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Pekka Kana 2
attr.desc: Pekka Kana 2 (Pekka the Rooster 2) is a jump 'n run game made in the spirit of old classic platformers such as Super Mario, Sonic the Hedgehog, Jazz Jackrabbit, Super Frog and so on.
attr.inst: Pekka Kana 2 files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Pigeon Ascent
attr.desc: *Optimized for 4:3 640x480 and 5:3 1920x1152*. Take care of your own pigeon as they fight increasingly stronger foes, and then face the legendary Pigeon God at the end... can you keep death far from your bird?
attr.inst: Pigeon Ascent files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Pinball Disc Room
attr.desc: How did you end up in this pinball of death? The blades teleport in. Dodge the discs to survive. Knock down the popups to open the passage way but beware you can't control when you exit.
attr.inst: All game files included

attr.title: Planet Waves
attr.desc: An arcade tower defense about protecting a small planet made for the gotm.io jam #3 by Escada Games
attr.inst: All files already included. Run PlanetWaves.sh

attr.title: Plaque Attack Remake
attr.desc: *Optimized for 4:3 and 16:9 (or similar ex. rg552). Could scale weirdly on gameboy like aspect ratio.* Atari 2600's Plaque Attack game remake made for Highjam #1 by Escada Games.
attr.inst: Plaque attack Remake files are already included and ready to go. To Force a particular version rename the desired one in the installation folder as PlaqueAttackRemake.zip and delete the other one, then boot.

attr.title: Pocket Tactics
attr.desc:
A GameBoy themed reimplementation of Tiny Tactics

After the collapse of human civilization, rogue warriors fight for scraps on the surface, fighting for what few remnants they can find from the old world, and sheltering in caves from the chemically modified rain that pours like thick soup onto the landscape below.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Powder
attr.desc: A roguelike is a dungeon crawler where no two games are the same. The maps are different, the items are different, there are no guaranteed win paths.
attr.inst: Powder files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Prehistorik 2
attr.desc: A caveman-era platform game using the Blues Brothers game engine developed by Titus Interactive.
attr.inst: Includes the demo files. You can add your own full game Dos files to the ports/prehistorik2/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Pure Metal: Feature 1
attr.desc: Base has been attacked and you are the last hope of saving Pure Metal. Shoot down hoards of enemies and unforgiving bosses in classic shooter style. Touch controls feature smooth analog from the onscreen D-pad. Use the arrow keys and the z and x buttons to shoot the enemy with the keyboard. You have one life to make it through each level, but don't worry your ship can take 3 consecutive hits before being destroyed. Also your ship will regenerate to full power if you can manage to avoid enemy fire long enough. Bob and weave your way through the enemy fire and kill every thing in site. This game is designed to brutally come after you but pay attention and look for the patterns and avoid the onslaught of bullets.
attr.inst: Just copy the game.win or data.win inside the gamedata folder. Windows store version works too.

attr.title: Quake 1
attr.desc: Quake 1 is one of the first fully 3D First-person shooter games released by id software.
attr.inst: Includes shareware pak file.  You can add your own full game pak files to the ports/quake/quakepaks/id1 folder.

attr.title: Quake 2
attr.desc: Quake 2 is the sequel to Quake 1, one of the first fully 3D First-person shooter games released by id software.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files to the ports/quake2/baseq2 folder.

attr.title: Quake 3
attr.desc: Quake III Arena is a 1999 multiplayer-focused first-person shooter developed by id Software.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files and product key to the ports/quake3/baseq3 folder.

attr.title: Raptor
attr.desc: Reversed-engineered source port from Raptor Call Of The Shadows
attr.inst: Shareware files are included and game is ready to run. See readme for detailed instructions for full version game files and other configuration options. In the name and callsign section, make sure the crosshair is not on input fields, press start + down to enable text entry. Press start once done to complete entry.

attr.title: RAWGL
attr.desc: A re-implementation of the engine used in the game Another World aka Out of this World in the US.
attr.inst: Includes the Out of this World demo files.  You can add your own full game files to the ports/rawgl/gamedata/ folder.  See https://github.com/cyxx/rawgl#supported-versions for more supported files info.

attr.title: Redneck Rampage 1
attr.desc: Redneck Rampage 1 using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version REDNECK.GRP and REDNECK.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-redneck1/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Redneck Rampage 2
attr.desc: Redneck Rampage 2 using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version REDNECK.GRP and REDNECK.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-redneck2/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Reminiscence
attr.desc: A reimplementation of the Flashback game using the reminiscence engine by Alex Chermenin.
attr.inst: You will need the original files of the PC version copied to ports/reminiscence/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Retro Time
attr.desc: RetroTime is a game containing 8 retro based games playable in 3 game modes being Retro Carousel, Time Attack and Lives mode.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Return to Castle Wolfenstein
attr.desc: Return to Castle Wolfenstein using the iortcw project.  With porting work done by JohnnyonFlame.  Packaged by Romadu.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own pak0.pk3, sp_pak1.pk3, sp_pak2.pk3, and sp_pak3.pk3 to the ports/iortcw/main folder.

attr.title: Ri-li
attr.desc: A simple and fun arcade-style game in which you control a wooden toy train and collect wooden letters while avoiding obstacles.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Rick Dangerous
attr.desc: An open source implementation of the legendary game "Rick Dangerous" using the xrick libretro retroarch core.
attr.inst: All necessary files are already included.

attr.title: Rigel Engine
attr.desc: A modern re-implementation of the classic DOS game Duke Nukem II.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full game files to the ports/RigelEngine/ folder.

attr.title: Rise Of The Triad
attr.desc: An open source port of Rise of the Triad by icculus.
attr.inst: The demo files are already included.

attr.title: Rlvm
attr.desc: Rlvm is a Free Software reimplementation of the Key RealLive interpreter for Visual Novels. Notable games include CLANNAD, AIR, & KANON.
attr.inst: Add your game files to the ports/rlvm/games/GAME_NAME directory, multiple games can be installed and you will get a choice of which game you want to play at launch. HD Releases do not currently work properly.

attr.title: Rocks N Diamonds
attr.desc: A Boulderdash type game by Holger Schemel with many unique features, such as the ability to play remade levels from Boulderdash, Emerald Mine and Supaplex and many more levels.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: ROTA
attr.desc:
Rotate gravity as you walk over the edge!
Push, pull and rotate gravity-blocks to traverse the stage and solve puzzles.
Collect all 50 gems to unlock doors and explore 8 vibrant worlds!
Listen to an original ambient soundtrack that will keep you relaxed while solving challenging puzzles. (:
Watch out for spikes! 0:
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: RVGL
attr.desc: An open source port of Re-Volt by the RV Team.
attr.inst: Necessary files will be downloaded and installed upon initial launch while connected to the internet.

attr.title: SDL Sopwith
attr.desc: SDL Sopwith is a port of the game Sopwith, which was originally by BMB CompuScience Canada.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: SDLPoP
attr.desc: An open-source port of Prince of Persia, based on the disassembly of the DOS version, extended with new features by NagyD
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Shadow Warrior
attr.desc: Shadow Warrior open source port by Jonathan Fowler.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version SW.GRP and SW.RTS Shadow Warrior files to the ports/shadow-warrior folder.

attr.title: Shipwreck
attr.desc: Shipwreck is a top down adventure game in which you must travel the land, explore dungeons, and defeat monsters to earn safe passage off the island on which you are stranded.  Note there are several games called Shipwreck, this is the one by Brushfire Games.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Shipwreck for Linux copied to the ports/shipwreck/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Shovel Knight Treasure Trove
attr.desc: Shovel Knight Treasure Trove loader.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Shovel Knight Treasure Trove for Linux copied to the ports/shovelknight/gamedata folder.  For more info on the setup needs, see https://github.com/christianhaitian/arkos/wiki/ArkOS-Emulators-and-Ports-information

attr.title: Simple Sokoban
attr.desc: Simple Sokoban is a simple Sokoban game that supports animated movements,unlimited level solutions, unlimited undos and more. It does not have any sound
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: SkiJump3
attr.desc: Ski Jump International v3
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Sonic 1
attr.desc: Sonic the Hedgehog 1 decompilation by Rubberduckycooly.
attr.inst: Just add your own android Data.rsdk file to the ports/sonic1 folder.  See the wiki for more info on this.

attr.title: Sonic 2
attr.desc: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 decompilation by Rubberduckycooly.
attr.inst: Just add your own android Data.rsdk file to the ports/sonic2 folder.  See the wiki for more info on this.

attr.title: Sonic CD
attr.desc: Sonic the Hedgehog CD decompilation by Rubberduckycooly.
attr.inst: Just add your own android Data.rsdk file to the ports/soniccd folder.  See the wiki for more info on this.

attr.title: Sonic Mania
attr.desc: Sonic the Hedgehog Mania decompilation by Rubberduckycooly.
attr.inst: Just add your own android Data.rsdk file to the ports/sonicmania folder.  See the wiki for more info on this.

attr.title: Sonic RB2 Kart
attr.desc: Sonic Robo Blast 2 Kart fangame by Sonic Team Junior.  All necessary files are already included.  !!!Warning!!! This is a 184MB package and will take a while to download and install.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Sonic Robo Blast 2
attr.desc: Sonic Robo Blast 2 fangame by Sonic Team Junior.  All necessary files are already included.  !!!Warning!!! This is a 184MB package and will take a while to download and install.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: SorR
attr.desc: Streets of Rage Remake.
attr.inst: Just add your own sorr.dat file, mod folder, and palettes folder into the ports/sorr folder.  See the wiki for more info on this.

attr.title: Space Cadet Pinball
attr.desc: A reversed engineered version Space Cadet Pinball.
attr.inst: Just add your own Space Cadet Pinball PINBALL.DAT files and sound files to the spacecadetpinball folder.

attr.title: Spelunky
attr.desc: Spelunky Classic HD.  A modified version of Derek Yu's game Spelunky Classic. Based on the source code published in Humble Weekly Bundle: Play and Create with GameMaker (not original 1.1 release).
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Spooky Ghosts Dot Com
attr.desc: Spooky Ghosts Dot Com is a small metroidvania about a ghost hunter named Ruby. One Halloween night a ghost hunting job comes in, but it turns out to not be a regular gig!
attr.inst: Copy the file SpookyGhostsDotCom inside the game folder, if you have the steam version rename the file "SpookyGhostsDotCom-Steam".

jediacademy.zip.name: jediacademy.zip
items: Star Wars Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy.sh

attr.title: Star Wars Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy
attr.desc: An open source port of Jedi Academy using OpenJK by the JACoders team. Originally developed by Raven Software.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files to the ports/JediAcademy/base folder.

jedioutcast.zip.name: jedioutcast.zip
items: Star Wars Jedi Knight II - Jedi Outcast.sh

attr.title: Star Wars Jedi Knight II - Jedi Outcast
attr.desc: An open source port of Jedi Outcast using OpenJK by the JACoders team. Originally developed by Raven Software.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files to the ports/JediOutcast/base folder.

attr.title: StarBoy
attr.desc: During its journey StarBoy crashed and got lost in an unknown planet, help him return back to its spaceship!
attr.inst:
You can purchase StarBoy at: https://mrkdji.itch.io/starboy

Download and extract it, and place the starboy_linux.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with starboy_linux.zip, version 1.0.3

LEFT/RIGHT = Horizontal movement
UP/DOWN = Climb ladder
A = Grab & throw
B = Jump

attr.title: Starcatcher
attr.desc: Starcatcher is a platformer inspired by Kirby, Metroid, Gravitron Experiment. Your goal: Collect stars in outer space.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Stardew Valley
attr.desc: An open-ended country-life RPG!
attr.inst: You must have a copy of the compatibility version of Stardew Valley copied to the ports/stardewvalley/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Steel Assault
attr.desc: Punch, whip, and zipline your way through a post-apocalyptic America in this 16-bit retro-style action platformer!
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Steel Assault for Linux copied to the ports/steelassault/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Super Mario War
attr.desc: Super Mario War is a fan-made multiplayer Super Mario Bros. style deathmatch game in which players try to beat one another in a variety of gameplay modes.  Great fun even in single player mode.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: SuperTux
attr.desc: SuperTux is a jump'n'run game with strong inspiration from the Super Mario Bros. games for the various Nintendo platforms.  !!!Warning!!! This is a 169MB package and will take a while to download and install.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: SuperTuxKart
attr.desc: SuperTuxKart is a 3D open-source arcade racer with a variety characters, tracks, and modes to play.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play. This port uses the low quality mobile assets. See the readme file for instructions on adding the full quality assets.

attr.title: SuperXYX
attr.desc: The year is 3999, humanity has long colonized itself across the galaxy, devouring new worlds for their resources, enjoying the interstellar life of luxury, more or less friendly interactions with other alien races. That was until an ancient threat has awakened from it's slumber..
attr.inst: Copy the data.win file and the texts and music folders inside gamedata. Then Boot the game.

attr.title: Supet Hydorah
attr.desc: Super Hydorah is a nonlinear horizontal shoot' em up designed to offer a challenging experience, sublimating the richness of traditional shmup classics.
attr.inst: Copy the data.win file and the texts and music folders inside gamedata. Then Boot the game from Hydorah.sh

attr.title: Tamatool
attr.desc: Tamatool is a Tamagotchi P1 emulator.
attr.inst: Tamatool requires a compatible Tamagotchi P1 ROM called rom.bin in its folder.

attr.title: The Curse Of Issyos
attr.desc: Defkalion was fishing on a quiet blue sea when he heard the voice of the Goddess Athena. Hurry up, she said, the isle of Issyos has been cursed by the Olympus. And so, fearing for his daughter Delia, his only family left, the fisherman sails back to his home, where the adventure is about to begin.
attr.inst: To succesfully boot the game copy the data.win file into the gamedata folder, then boot the game from Coi.sh

attr.title: Thermomorph
attr.desc:
An Alien-inspired survive-the-night horror game, created in Love2D.

Your crew is dead. Unidentified creatures stalk the halls of your mining ship. Armed with a motion sensor and a flamethrower, you must survive until the escape pod is repaired.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Thwack
attr.desc: Funky-legged tennis game. Thwack demo/jam files are already included and ready to go.
attr.inst:
The full game is available for purchase at https://jontopielski.itch.io/thwack. To run the full game, down ThwackLinux.zip, extract it, and copy the Thwack.pck file into the gamedata directory. This supports the ThwackLinux.zip, Apr 28 2023 release.

DPAD/ANALOG = Movement
A/B = Thwack it

attr.title: Tile World
attr.desc:
Tile World is a source port clone of Chip's Challenge.

Handheld edition based on: https://github.com/senquack/tileworld-for-handhelds
attr.inst: To play the original Chip's Challenge levels, copy 'chips.dat' into 'ports/tileworld/data' and make sure it's lowercase.

attr.title: Timespinner
attr.desc: Travel back in time to change fate itself, in this beautifully crafted story-driven adventure, inspired by classic 90s action-platformers.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Timespinner for Linux copied to the ports/timespinner/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Tiny Crate
attr.desc: Tiny Crate is a cute little precision platformer with puzzle elements! Lift and toss crates to traverse over spike pits and reach higher ground! Push yourself and make tight jumps! You got this!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Titan Tactics
attr.desc: A follow up to Pocket Tactics, Titan Tactics is inspired by the awesome tactic games of the 90s. Fight with your allies and uncover the mysteries of the kingdoms of Tyrmyr and Skathi!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Tomb Raider 1
attr.desc: An open source port of Tomb Raider 1 using OpenLara engine by xProger.
attr.inst: Just add your steam or gog Tomb Raider 1 files to the ports/tombraider1 folder.

attr.title: Ubermosh Collection
attr.desc:
Collection of all the 8 games of the saga.
Omega and Vol7 suggested only with device with 2 gb or more of ram, but works also on lower specs devices, often with very long boot time (up to 3 min for these two for the first boot). Jelos could have weird visualization of some menu sometimes but the interaction works and the gameplay works as espected.
attr.inst: Inside the game folders you will find 8 folders each with the name of a Ubermosh game. Place the data.win you have inside in the correct gamedata "ie. Ubermosh black data.win in "BLACK/gamedata"

attr.title: Ultimate Tapan Kaikki
attr.desc: A simple top-down shooter.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Undertale
attr.desc: Undertale loader.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Undertale Linux version assets copied to the ports/undertale/assets folder.  For more info on the setup needs, see https://github.com/christianhaitian/arkos/wiki/ArkOS-Emulators-and-Ports-information

attr.title: Upo
attr.desc:
Upo is a procedurally generated music game.
Your goal is to avoid collision with flying objects in rhytm to the music.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Ur-Quan Masters
attr.desc:
The Ur-Quan Masters is a 2002 open source fangame modification, based on the action-adventure science fiction game Star Control II.

!!!Warning!!! This is a 369MB package and will take a while to download and install.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action
attr.desc: VA-11 HALL-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action is a booze em' up about waifus, technology, and post-dystopia life. In this world, corporations reign supreme, all human life is infected with nanomachines designed to oppress them, and the terrifying White Knights ensure that everyone obeys the laws..
attr.inst: To boot copy the data.win/game.unx files and all the folder inside the gamedata folder and then boot the game from Valhalla.sh.

attr.title: VanillaRA
attr.desc: Vanilla Conquer is a fully portable version Command and Conquer Red Alert.
attr.inst: The game comes with the demo files, read the README for detailed information on installing the full game.

attr.title: VanillaTD
attr.desc: Vanilla Conquer is a fully portable version Command and Conquer Tiberium Dawn.
attr.inst: The game comes with the demo files, read the README for detailed information on installing the full game.

attr.title: VCMI - Heroes of Might and Magic III
attr.desc: VCMI is a fully portable version of Heroes of Might and Magic III.
attr.inst: Copy the GoG installer files to ports/vcmi and it will install the game files as required, see the README for more information.

attr.title: VVVVVV
attr.desc: VVVVVV is a 2010 puzzle-platform game created by Terry Cavanagh.
attr.inst: The free Make and Play Edition data.zip file is already included.  You can also add your own purchased copy of the data.zip from your VVVVVV into the ports/VVVVVV folder if you prefer that version instead.

attr.title: Wetspot 2
attr.desc: A port of QuickBasic 4.5 game Wetspot 2 by Angelo Mottola.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Wizardchase
attr.desc:
2D retro pacman like arcade game

Collect all the treasure in the dungeon!  Can you make it to the second level? 
Leave your highest score in the comments.  Good luck!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Wizznic
attr.desc: Wizznic! is an open-source, freeware remake of Puzznic, recreating the original arcade levels, the NES ones and including fan-made puzzle packs with new custom levels. The gameplay remains exactly the same, where the player has to move individual tiles, arranging them inside a restricted space to create groups of identical blocks and make all disappear by touching each other. Elevators and other features gradually start to appear on later levels.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play

attr.title: Wordle SDL
attr.desc:
Wordle SDL is a port of a clone of Wordle made with SDL.

Wordle is a web-based word game created and developed by Welsh software engineer Josh Wardle, and owned and published by The New York Times Company since 2022. Players have six attempts to guess a five-letter word, with feedback given for each guess in the form of colored tiles indicating when letters match or occupy the correct position.
attr.inst: All files are included and ready.

attr.title: World War II GI
attr.desc: World War 2 GI using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version WW2GI.GRP and WW2DI.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-WWII/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Worship Vector
attr.desc: Worship Vector is a Tower Defense type game. The game is based upon a unique map, which extends automatically.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: xkcd Hoverboard
attr.desc: Standalone version of xkcd 1608 Hoverboard game
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Yatka
attr.desc:
YATKA is one of many Tetris implementations available. Motivation behind this one was, on the one hand, to create a game that would conform to modern rules of the game, while, on the other, to make possible running it on resource-limited platforms (e.g. Bittboy or JZ4760-based handheld consoles).
Two Classic themes by Tekkenfede included.
attr.inst: All file included, boot the game and play

attr.title: ZeroRanger
attr.desc: ZeroRanger is a vertically scrolling 2D shoot'em up with heavy emphasis on shooting, dodging and... mystery?
attr.inst: To start the game copy the data.win/game.unx and all the ogg files inside the gamedata folder, then boot the game from the ports menu on your device.

attr.title: ZGloom
attr.desc: ZGloom is a re-implementation of Amiga FPS Gloom, including support for Gloom 3, Gloom Deluxe and Zombie Massacre.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to run.

attr.title: Znax
attr.desc: Znax is a remake of a game by Nick Kouvaris. It is a sort of puzzle / arcade game where you as the player need to select 4 blocks of the same color and form rectangles as big as you can
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.
